Uses of Invocation in sorcer.falcon.core.exertion
 

Classes in sorcer.falcon.core.exertion that implement Invocation
 class IfExertion
          The IfExertion implements the Conditional interface.
 class WhileExertion
          WhileExertion is a new exertion extending from the ServiceExertion and also implements the Conditional interface .
 

Uses of Invocation in sorcer.security.sign
 

Classes in sorcer.security.sign that implement Invocation
 class SignedServiceTask
           Any task that needs to be saved in a database is sent by encapsulating it in a SignedServiceTask.
 

Uses of Invocation in sorcer.service
 

Subinterfaces of Invocation in sorcer.service
 interface AsyncExertion
          An asynchronus exertion is a service-oriented indirect message with an enclosed service Context and a collection of service Signatures.
 interface Exertion
          An exertion is a federated service command (statement) communicated by a requestor - Service.service(sorcer.service.Exertion, net.jini.core.transaction.Transaction), to a service provider Service.
 interface MonitoredExertion
           
 

Classes in sorcer.service that implement Invocation
 class Job
          A job is a composite service-oriented message comprised of Exertion instances with its own service Context and a collection of service Signatures.
 class ServiceExertion
           
 class Task
          A Task is an elementary service-oriented message Exertion (with its own service Context and a collection of service Signatures.
